txt.en: Now that you have dealt with the local wildlife, Nos Grimsong has asked you to help with restocking supplies for Frerin's Court.

'You have done such tremendous work helping us in Frerin's Court that I cannot help but ask you to help with one final task.

'There are fallen pieces of lumber to the south-west, up the hill. Take this axe with you to chop them up into manageable piles and bring them back to me.

'Keep a wary eye out for danger...the Dourhands have not kept safe the lands surrounding Thorin's Hall.'
Lumber can be found to the south-west of Frerin's Court.\n\nNos Grimsong has asked you to gather lumber for him.
'Oh well done, well done! With this wood, we should be able to keep warm for the next few days.\n\n'Thank you for your help, [placeholder]. I hope it wasn't too much trouble.'
Nos Grimsong is at Frerin's Cour, north-east of where you gathered the lumber.\n\nYou should return to Nos Grimsong to collect your reward.
'Did you manage to gather the wood, [placeholder]?'
Talk to Nos Grimsong at Frerin's Court
